fields.text: Thank you for calling Hims, the men's wellness brand bringing science-backed solutions from San Francisco to you.
For new orders and product inquiries, press [INDEX].
For details on our wellness products and scientific approach, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we retrieve information about our wellness solutions.
To speak with a Hims product specialist, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a Hims product specialist.
For prescription refills and account support, press [INDEX].
To check the status of your prescription refill, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we look up your prescription refill details.
For billing, subscription, and account questions, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our account support team.
